Title: Designates alpha-PVP, its salts, optical isomers and salts of optical isomers, as schedule I stimulant controlled substances
Summary: Designates alpha-PVP, its salts, optical isomers and salts of optical isomers, as schedule I stimulant controlled substances.
LawCode: Amd ยง3306, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to designating alpha-PVP as a schedule I stimulant controlled substance
